729680.name: RANDOM WARS
729680.description:
Random Wars is an exhilarating first-person shooter (FPS) that immerses players in the life of a soldier from a broad perspective. The game is exclusively multiplayer, offering rigorous training, challenging simulations, and intense combat. Every mode in this game is crafted with a no-respawn rule, emphasizing swift action and a robust medic system. True to its name, the game's core concept is unpredictability, allowing players to engage in a vast array of maps designed by fellow soldiers, each with unique objectives to accomplish alongside your team.

Key Features:

  • An FPS that boasts a distinctive ballistic system, where gravity and gun positioning are critical factors to master.
  • Optimized for both low-end and high-end configurations, ensuring a smooth gaming experience for a wide range of players
  • Advanced netcode powered by Photon Engine, guaranteeing superior network synchronization for seamless gameplay.
  • A map editor feature that continuously rejuvenates the player's experience by offering new terrains to conquern
729680.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
